Get Codebook Files

get_codebook_files.Rd

Returns codebook/support files (PDFs, questionnaires, metadata files) associated with a study.

Usage

get_codebook_files(srvy = NULL, codebook = NULL, file = NULL, quiet = FALSE, refresh = FALSE)

Arguments

srvy

A qesR survey code. Required if codebook is NULL.

codebook

A qes_codebook object.

file

Optional file selector passed to get_codebook() when codebook is not provided.

quiet

If TRUE, suppress informational output when downloading.

refresh

If TRUE, force a fresh codebook download when codebook is not provided.

Value

A data frame of codebook/support files.

On this page
